Name: Wet cocktail
Ingredients: Top up with Thomas Henry Ginger Ale
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
STRAIN into glass filled with crushed ice.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Superbly refreshing. The pinch of cinnamon adds delicate spice which combines well with cachaça and ginger ale.
History: Created in 2015 by Jorge Balbontin, Barcelona, Spain.
